property.name: Text Box
property.value: Open: Destroy your performing Yojimbo and target your discarded Courtier or Shugenja: Bring him into play, paying all costs but reducing his Gold cost to enter play by your Yojimbo's base Gold Cost plus 1. Battle/Open: Choose your performing Personality: Straighten him. You may take an additional action appropriate to this phase.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: IMPERIAL POLITICAL Open: Choose your performing unbowed Courtier, discard the Imperial Favor, and target a Personality: Dishonor him. His controller may not assign him, and he will not move, to battlefields this turn.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: FOREST TEMPLE Bow this card: Produce 2 Gold, or 3 Gold when paying for a Nonhuman. Open: Bow this card and target a Nonhuman or Samurai: Straighten him. Straighten one of his attachments if he is Nonhuman.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: LION CLAN SAMURAI COMMANDER TACTICIAN EXPERIENCED UNIQUE HEAD OF THE SECOND CITY GUARDSMEN Battle: Even if Tsudoken is bowed: Straighten him. He rallies the guards. You may target a Personality and bow or straighten him.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: CRANE CLAN AIR SHUGENJA Open: Bow Shigemitsu or one of his Spells: Give each of your provinces +1 strength. If it is not your turn, before it ends, if none of your provinces were destroyed this turn, gain 1 Honor.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: PHOENIX CLAN WATER MONK SHUGENJA CAVALRY HENSHIN UNIQUE ELEMENTAL MASTER After Chukage enters play: Search your discard pile, then hand, then deck, for a Ring of Water. Put it into play or in your hand. Reaction: Even if Chukage is bowed, after the resolution of an action that moved your Personality: Move Chukage to the Personality's location. Straighten Chukage's unit if he moved.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: PHOENIX CLAN VOID SHUGENJA INQUISITOR MAGISTRATE Battle: Target an enemy Personality: Reduce his Force to 0. Destroy a card without attachments in his unit if he is Kolat, Ninja, or Shadowlands.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: PHOENIX CLAN AIR MONK GOLDEN ARM HENSHIN After Karachu bows: Straighten him.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: UNIQUE Until your Events Phase two turns from now begins, all players have the ability, 'Battle: Choose your performing unbowed attacking Personality, bow all unbowed cards in his unit, and target an enemy card without attachments: Destroy it.'

property.name: Text Box
property.value: NINJA Open: Bow your performing Ninja Personality and target a Retainer: Destroy it. Battle: Choose your performing Ninja Personality with no non-Ninja Followers at the current battlefield: Move him to a different location. If he moved, straighten his unit. Discard a card in a province.

property.name: Clan
property.value: Scorpion Clan

property.name: Text Box
property.value: SCORPION CLAN SAMURAI MAGISTRATE Battle: Ranged 4 Attack. If the Ranged Attack destroyed a card, its owner loses 1 Honor.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: SCORPION CLAN SAMURAI BITTER LIES KENSAI PARAGON YOJIMBO LOYAL Battle: Target an enemy card without attachments: Bow it. If Toshimo has a Weapon or you control a Courtier, negate the card's straightening.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: PEARL EXPERIENCED UNIQUE Limited: Destroy this card and target a Personality in any player's discard pile: Bring him into play (under your control), paying all costs, but paying 4 less Gold if the Personality is Nonhuman.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Battle/Open: Target an attachment and pay Gold equal to its Gold Cost minus two: Destroy it. Battle: If there are enemy units at the current battlefield, choose your performing Personality: Move him there. Straighten him if he moved.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: UNIQUE Any player who controls the Imperial Favor discards it. Until your Events Phase two turns from now begins, actions that discard the Imperial Favor as a cost have their effects negated if they target a Nonhuman Personality. Until the game ends, Nonhumans may not perform Political actions.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: DARK VIRTUE STRENGTH Open: Choose your performing Samurai: Straighten his unit. Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Samurai and target an enemy card without attachments: Bow it. Destroy it if your Samurai is a Paragon.

property.name: Legality
property.value: Ivory Edition

property.name: Text Box
property.value: PORT You may use your Stronghold's abilities even if it is bowed. Bow this card: Produce 5 Gold.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Open: Choose your performing unbowed Tactician and target another of your Personalities: Give the Personality +3F. After the next time this turn another player's action targets him, negate its effects.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: CURSED WEAPON Battle: Any number of times per turn, give this Personality -1C: Ranged 3 Attack. Battle: Bow this card, give this Personality -1C, and target an enemy card without attachments: Remove it from the game.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: CRANE CLAN SAMURAI IRON CRANE SCOUT Battle: Target a Personality opposing Takichi at the current battlefield: Move the Personality and Takichi to the same adjacent unresolved battlefield.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: SPIDER CLAN SHADOWLANDS SAMURAI COMMANDER CONQUEROR DARK DEATH PARAGON EXPERIENCED 2 UNIQUE After Gyoken enters play: Lose 2 Honor. Battle/Open: Target your Personality and a non-Unique attachment in any player's discard pile: Attach it to the Personality, paying all costs and ignoring Honor Requirements. You may take an additional action appropriate to this phase.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: SPIDER CLAN SHADOWLANDS SAMURAI CONQUEROR DARK STALKER PARAGON After Murota enters play: Lose 2 Honor. Battle: Target an enemy card, which must have no attachments unless Murota has performed a Dark Virtue action this turn: Bow it.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: CRANE CLAN SAMURAI DUELIST MAGISTRATE EXPERIENCED 2 LOYAL UNIQUE FIRST MAGISTRATE Open: Target a Personality: Choose one of his abilities; it may not be used. Battle: Target an enemy Personality: Hakuseki issues him an unrefusable challenge. The controller of the duel's winner gains 2 Honor. Bow the duel's loser, and destroy him if he is dishonorable.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: CRANE CLAN COURTIER ARTISAN Political Open: Discard the Imperial Favor and target a Personality or Holding: Choose one of its abilities; it may not be used.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: POLITICAL Open: Choose your performing unbowed Personality and target another player's Personality: Your Personality duels the other. In this duel, each Personality uses Personal Honor as his duel stat. The duel's winner's controller gains 1 Honor. Bow and dishonor the duel's loser.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: POLITICAL Other players' Personalities and Followers in play have -2 Gold Cost and all players have the ability, 'Political Limited: Discard the Imperial Favor or pay 6 Gold: Discard a card titled Economic Repercussions from play.' Limited: Put this card into play.

property.name: Legality
property.value: Ivory Edition

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Reaction: After the Attacker announces a Battle action before the Defender's first normal opportunity to act or pass: Negate its effects. Battle: Target an enemy card without attachments: Bow it.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: As a Focus Effect: After this duel's resolution, its winner's controller discards a card. Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Commander and target an enemy Personality: If your Commander has a Follower, you may target and destroy an attachment in the Personality's unit. Move him home.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: IMPERIAL POLITICAL UNIQUE Reaction: After engaging, if any enemy units are at the current battlefield: Create a 4F/4C/3PH Imperial • Samurai • Duelist • Magistrate Personality on your side there. Remove him from the game after this battle ends.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: BUSHIDO VIRTUE COMPASSION Reaction: After engaging, choose your performing Samurai at the current battlefield: Create a 1F Ashigaru • Cavalry Follower and attach it to him. If he is a Paragon, gain 2 Honor and draw a card.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: FEAR Battle: Choose your performing Personality and target an enemy Personality or Follower: Give it -4F. If your Personality is Nonhuman, give each of your Personalities at the current battlefield +1F.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: TERRAIN Before this battle's resolution: Choose and bow zero to two cards at the current battlefield with 4 or greater Force. Battle: If no Terrain is at the current battlefield: Put this card into play there.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: CRAB CLAN NAGA SAMURAI ARTISAN BLACKSMITH HERO TACTICIAN EXPERIENCED UNIQUE Limited: Target your Personality: Create a +1F Armor or Weapon Item and attach it to him. Battle: Target an enemy card without attachments: Bow it. If it is an attachment, remove it from the game.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: CRAB CLAN BERSERKER Battle: Target an enemy Personality: Bow him. He may not perform actions.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: MANTIS CLAN NONHUMAN FOX SPIRIT UNIQUE May not be included in decks. Battle: Target an enemy attacking Personality: Move him home.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: UNIQUE As a Focus Effect: Delay all consequences of losing this duel (from any source) until the end of the turn. Battle: Choose your performing bowed Personality: Straighten him. If he is Unique, you may take an additional Battle action to use one of his base abilities.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Limited: Remove this card from the game: Choose a Kiho Strategy in your discard pile. Put it into your hand.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: LION CLAN SAMURAI SCOUT Battle: Target a card in a unit; the card must have no attachments unless you control a Terrain: Bow or straighten the card.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: FEAR Battle: Choose your performing Berserker Personality and target another player's Personality not at the current battlefield: Move them both there. Straighten each unit that this moved.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: UNICORN CLAN WATER SHUGENJA CAVALRY DEATH PRIEST Battle: Choose a Personality in a discard pile, remove him from the game, and target an enemy Personality: Move him home. Bow him if the Personality you chose was dead.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: LION CLAN WATER SHUGENJA Reaction: After Kagako enters play: She summons an ancestor. Create a 2F/2C/3PH Lion Clan • Samurai • Ancestor • Spirit Personality. Gain 1 Honor.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: DRAGON CLAN COURTIER DUELIST MAGISTRATE Open: Target an attachment: Bow it.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: MANTIS CLAN EARTH SHUGENJA NAVAL SCOUT EXPERIENCED UNIQUE Reaction: Once per game, after Hisano enters play: Create a 2F/2C/3PH Mantis Clan • Nonhuman • Fox • Spirit • Unique Personality with the ability, 'Battle: Target an enemy attacking Personality: Move him home.'

property.name: Text Box
property.value: LION CLAN SAMURAI PARAGON Battle: Target an enemy unit: Reduce the Force of each Personality and Follower in it by Koyama's Personal Honor. Bow any cards in the unit whose Force is now 0.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: DRAGON CLAN SAMURAI KENSAI Battle: Bow Kojinrue or one of his Weapons, and target an enemy card without attachments: Destroy it.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: MANTIS CLAN THUNDER SHUGENJA NAVAL Battle resolution does not bow cards in this unit.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: UNICORN CLAN SAMURAI CAVALRY COMMANDER EXPERIENCED UNIQUE Followers in Xiao's army have +1F. Battle: Target an enemy card without attachments: Destroy it.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Battle: Even if you control no units at the current battlefield, choose your performing unbowed Kensai, who may be at an adjacent battlefield to the current one if he has a Weapon attached: Ranged 6 Attack (against a target at the current battlefield).

property.name: Text Box
property.value: SPIDER CLAN SHADOWLANDS NINJA SHUGENJA UNMAKER After Shiho enters play: Lose 1 Honor. Battle: Put Shiho on top of your Dynasty deck and target an enemy Personality: Put all cards without attachments in his unit on the bottom of their owners' appropriate decks.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Open: Bow your two performing Nonhuman Personalities, and target a card without attachments in a unit and with a lower Gold Cost than the combined Gold Cost of your Nonhumans: Destroy the targeted card.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: PEARL UNIQUE Battle/Open: Bow this card: Straighten this Personality.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: PEARL This Shugenja has +1F for each Pearl card you control and in your discard piles. Battle: Bow this card: Ranged Attack with strength equal to this Shugenja's Chi, plus the number of Pearl cards you control and in your discard piles.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Battle: Bow your performing Shugenja, and destroy him unless he is Nonhuman: Ranged Attack with strength equal to his Force plus Chi. Battle: Bow your performing Shugenja: Ranged Attack with strength equal to his Force or Chi.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Limited: Target one or two face-down cards in provinces: Turn them face-up. Battle/Open: Target an attachment owned by another player: He may pay 4 Gold. If he did not, return it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Reaction: After a battle ends in which you destroyed a province as the Attacker: Create a Holding with the trait 'Bow this card: Produce 3 Gold' (it enters play bowed). Draw a card.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: KAMI UNIQUE Your Personalities have +1C while they are not involved in a duel. Reaction: When another player's action would target one of your cards, discard this card: Choose another of your non-Stronghold cards at the same location. The action targets it instead, if legal.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: NONHUMAN OROCHI CAVALRY This Personality has Naval.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: RECON Reaction: After engaging, choose your performing unbowed Scout at the current battlefield: You have Reconnaissance there. Put a non-Unique Battle Strategy in your discard pile into your hand. After this battle ends, if you did not destroy the battlefield's province or an army, discard a card at random.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: PHOENIX CLAN SAMURAI DUELIST YOJIMBO Iaijutsu Battle: Target an enemy Personality or Follower: Give it -5F.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: UNICORN CLAN SAMURAI TACTICIAN Battle: Even if Junpei is not at the current battlefield, target an enemy card without attachments: Bow it. If it is a Personality, negate his next movement.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: SCORPION CLAN NINJA DUELIST EXPERIENCED 2 UNIQUE Will not attach non-Ninja Followers. Reaction: When an action would target a Ninja at Aroru's location: Choose another of your cards. The action targets it instead, if legal. After the action's resolution, you may move Aroru to a different location. Battle: Other players may not take Reactions until this action ends. Ranged 5 Attack.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: SCORPION CLAN COURTIER SEDUCTRESS LOYAL Political Open: Bow Makiko: Take the Imperial Favor.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: SIEGE Battle: Ranged 4 Attack. Battle: Even if you control no units at the current battlefield: Increase or decrease its province's strength by the number of Castles you control.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: KIHO Battle: Choose your performing Monk: Straighten him. If you control a Temple, you may target a Personality or Follower and bow or straighten it.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Battle: Target an enemy Personality: You may target one of his attachments and pay Gold equal to its Gold Cost minus four. If you did, destroy it. Move the Personality home.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: IAIJUTSU Limited: Target another player's Personality: Create a 0F/3C/0PH Assassin • Duelist Personality. He issues an unrefusable challenge to the targeted Personality. Destroy the duel's loser. After the duel ends, remove the created Personality from the game.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: DRAGON CLAN EARTH SHUGENJA Kazushige has +2F while defending. Open: If it is another player's turn, target one of his Personalities: Before this phase ends, straighten him. Before this turn ends, if the Personality did not assign to attack this turn, gain 2 Honor.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: NONHUMAN NAGA PEARL SHUGENJA CHAMPION UNIQUE After The Dark Naga enters play: Lose 3 Honor. Reaction: After another player targets The Dark Naga with an action: You may bow one of your Forests. If you did, negate The Dark Naga's destruction from the action's effects. Battle: Target an enemy Personality: If he is Nonhuman, take control of him (he joins your army). If he is human, bow his unit. Destroy him before this turn ends.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: FOREST TEMPLE You do not gain Honor. You may not take Political actions. You do not lose Honor from cards you own. Before you lose Honor: Reduce the loss to 1, which may not be increased. Limited: Target your discarded Nonhuman Personality and discard a card in one of your provinces: Refill the province face-up with the Personality.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: EARTH While this Shugenja is Earth and defending, negate his destruction from other players' cards' effects. Battle: Bow this card and target an enemy card without attachments: Bow it. Gain 1 Honor.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Reaction: After the end of an Attack Phase in which you were the Defender: Create an additional Attack Phase with the previous phase's Attacker as the Defender. During this Attack Phase, you will not destroy more than one of the Defender's provinces and your Personalities may not assign and will not move unless they are Paragons or Battle Maidens.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: UNIQUE Each of your cards that is Courtier or Magistrate has +1F. Political Open: Bow this card and target a face-down card in a province: You claim a new tract of land. Turn the face-down card face-up. You may increase the province's strength by 2.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: NONHUMAN NAGA COMMANDER CONQUEROR Enters play paying 1 less Gold for each Nonhuman you control, up to 3 less Gold. Battle: Target an enemy Personality: Bow him or move him home.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: NONHUMAN NAGA PEARL SHUGENJA ABOMINATION Enters play paying 1 less Gold. Battle: Twice per turn, bow one of your Forests or Pearls: Give each of your Nonhuman cards at the current battlefield +1F.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: NONHUMAN NAGA UNIQUE Battle: Ranged 7 Attack. Battle: Even if this card is bowed, if this Personality is Nonhuman: Straighten this unit.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: THUNDER Battle: Bow this card and target an enemy Personality or Follower: Give it -4F. Battle: Destroy this card: Ranged 4 Attack with +2 strength if it targets a Follower. If this Shugenja is Thunder and the Ranged Attack destroyed a Follower, Ranged 4 Attack.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: DRAGON CLAN AIR MONK TATTOOED EXPERIENCED UNIQUE Battle/Open: Even if Osawa is bowed, target a Personality at Osawa's location: Bow or straighten him.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: CRAB CLAN SAMURAI SCOUT Battle: Bow your performing Follower: Ranged 4 Attack which may target a Personality with attached Followers if you have Reconnaissance.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: MANTIS CLAN SAMURAI BOUNTY HUNTER MAGISTRATE Battle: Ranged 4 Attack. If the Ranged Attack destroyed a card, you may target and straighten a Holding.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: UNICORN CLAN SAMURAI BATTLE MAIDEN CAVALRY PARAGON Negate Ji-Yun's dishonoring from other players' cards' effects.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Magistrate and target an enemy Personality: Your Magistrate takes him into custody. If he is dishonorable, destroy his attachments. Move him home.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: UNIQUE After your next turn begins, permanently give each of your provinces +2 strength.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: AIR POLITICAL While this Shugenja is Air, he straightens during each player's Straighten Phase. Open: Bow this Shugenja and target a face-up Personality out of play: Give him +1PH or +1 Gold Cost.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: SPIDER CLAN MONK KENSAI ORDER OF VENOM Open: Target your Holding: Yamazaki threatens the workers. Straighten it.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: CRAB CLAN COURTIER MERCHANT Political Open: Target another player's Personality: His controller chooses to either pay 4 Gold, lose 2 Honor, or do neither. If he did not pay 4 Gold or lose 2 Honor, the Personality may not be assigned, and will not move, into attacking armies.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: MANTIS CLAN SAMURAI SCOUT NAVAL Battle: Ranged 3 Attack with +2 strength if you have Reconnaissance.

property.name: Legality
property.value: Ivory Edition

property.name: Text Box
property.value: UNIQUE Limited: Draw two additional cards during your next End Phase.

property.name: Legality
property.value: Ivory Edition

property.name: Text Box
property.value: UNIQUE Battle/Open: Target one or two Personalities: Either negate all current and new Force bonuses and penalties on them from actions, or straighten their units.

property.name: Legality
property.value: Ivory Edition

property.name: Text Box
property.value: FOREST EXPERIENCED UNIQUE This card will not straighten before your third turn. Bow: Produce 2 Gold. Limited, Bow: Draw a card. If you now have 6 or more cards in your hand, discard a card.

property.name: Legality
property.value: Ivory Edition

property.name: Text Box
property.value: EXPERIENCED UNIQUE Bow: Produce 2 Gold. Limited: Once per game, put one to three cards in your hand at the bottom of your deck. Draw cards equal to the number you put at the bottom.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Open: If you control two or more Nonhuman Personalities, choose your performing Nonhuman Personality face-up in your province: Bring him into play, paying all costs. Refill the province face-up.
